mdx.rawBody:
Song: kanavE kalaiyAdhE
Film: kaNNedhirE thOndrinAL
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d2 n2 S

kanavE  kalaiyAdhE kAdhal kanavE  kalaiyAdhE
r m pdp m m  mgrgr rgs    r m pSp m m  mgrgr

kai yEndhiyE nAn kEtppadhu Or yAsagam
n3. s  s  s  r   s   s s   n3.s s s

kaN jAdayil nee pEsidum Or vAsagam
n3. s s s   r   s s s   n3.s s s

maragadha vArTHai solvAyA
r m p n   nd mp   n3 Sn3S

mownaTHinAlE kolvAyA
rm p n  ndmp n3 Sn3S

chinna thiruvAi malarvAyA
R   R  R  M MGR n3S  RGRG

Stanza 1:
nee mownam kAkkumbOdhum un sArbil endhan pErai un thOtta pookkaL sollum illayA
p   p  n   d  m  p p    p  p  n   d m    p p   p  pS  S  S   SR  n  n   n ndpndnp

oru thendral thattumbOdhum kadum puyalE muttumbOdhum ada pookkaL poigaL solvadhillayE
pp  p    n   d   m  p p    p  p  p p n  d  m  p p    pp  pS  S   S  SR  n  n n  ndpndnp

un idhazhai kEttAl hAa adhu poigaL sollum
r  rm  mp   g2 r       rr   rm mp  g2 r

un idhayam kEttAl hA adhu meigaL sollum
r  rm  mp  g2 r      rr   rm mnp g2 r

idhayaTHai kEtkka nEramillai
rm  p n    nd  mp n3S n3 S

idhuvarai idhayaTHil yArumillai
rm  p n   nd  m p    n3S n3 S

sandhum kidaiTHAl nuzhaivAyA
R  R    R RM MGRS n3S   RGRGR

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
uNmai kAdhal uNdu adhai uLLE vaiTHukoNdu oru manmadha sabayil sAbam vAngAdhE
melliya mazhayin thuLigaL oru mEgaTHukkuL uNdu adhuthAnE pozhiyum pizhiyappArkkAdhE
nee mazhai tharum muhilA hA illai idi tharum muhilA
ennudan nadappAyA illai vilagiduvAyA
AvaNi mAdham kazhiyattumE
kArTHigai vandhAl mazhai varumE
innum sila nAL poru manamE
